{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Planex |model=MZK-W300NH |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/23/2008 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Cameo |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=SJ9-MZKW300NH |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9130 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=25P64V6P |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5DU561622FTP-D43 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9130 |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR9102 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8216 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} [http://www.planex.net/product/router/mzk-w300nh.htm Product page]
[http://www.planex.net/pdf/router/MZK-W300NH_Manual_v1.0_Eng.pdf Manual] This device appears to be another OEM Cameo AP81 product. It looks very similar to the [[TRENDnet TEW-632BRP]]. [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/planex/mzk-w300nh On the OpenWrt wiki]
[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=79206 On the OpenWrt forums] The default SSID is probably '''planexuser'''. ==Images== [[File:Mzk-w300nh.jpg|300px]][[Has images::external| ]]
